p: Join a fast-growing company founded by leading industry veterans of AR, wearables, and robotics who just raised a sizeable Series B funding and with a 2-year run rate. This Machine Learning (Computer Vision) company is enabling the next-gen of intelligent robot assistants that are affordable and human-safe, and collaborating with well-known Fortune 100 companies. This is a rare opportunity to work on Software development and integration in Computer Vision and hardware platforms.

li: Build to the architecture and design of a proprietary software system in conjunction with other engineers and leaders
li.1: Participate and lead agile development workflows with daily scrums and biweekly sprint meetings
li.2: Problem solve and handle issues developing on internal and external systems
li.3: You will work primarily in Python/C++

li: BSc in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or another related field
li.2: Willing to learn and grow in the role

li: Work directly with industry veterans of top AI companies to work on Machine Learning products
li.1: Opportunity to progress on a pure Software or Machine Learning Track
li.4: You=E2=80=99ll be part of a team culture with ownership and a strong work-life balance
